post.description: Create a new API key for authentication. You can optionally provide a note to help identify the key.

note.description: Optional note to help identify this API key
Optional note associated with this API key

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the API key was created

delete.description: Permanently delete an API key. This action cannot be undone and the key will immediately become invalid.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of your API keys. Only partial key values are returned for security.

note.description: Optional note associated with this API key

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the API key was created

post.description: Redeem a manna voucher code to add manna to the authenticated user's account.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of tasks for the authenticated user with optional filtering by status, type, or tool.

output_type.description: Output type (e.g., image, video, audio, lora)

status.description: Task status (pending, running, completed, failed, cancelled)

apiKey.description: API key used for this task

post.description: Cancel a task that is currently in progress or queued for execution.
Calculate the estimated cost in manna for executing a task with specified tool and arguments.
Create and execute a new task using a specified tool with optional arguments and visibility settings.

makePublic.description: Whether to make the task public

output_type.description: Output type (e.g., image, video, audio, lora)

status.description: Task status (pending, running, completed, failed, cancelled)

apiKey.description: API key used for this task

get.description: Subscribe to real-time task update events via Server-Sent Events (SSE).
Retrieve detailed information about a specific task including its status and output.

output_type.description: Output type (e.g., image, video, audio, lora)

status.description: Task status (pending, running, completed, failed, cancelled)

apiKey.description: API key used for this task

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available tools with their metadata and configuration options.

parameters.description: Set to "true" to hide parameters and resolutions
parameters.name: hideParams

cost_estimate.description: Estimated cost to run the tool

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific tool including its parameters and configuration.

cost_estimate.description: Estimated cost to run the tool

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of transactions for the authenticated user.
